name: Nortwest Quest
description: A plataformer run and gun/boss rush like megaman, in this adventure you play as Fill Nortwest (whitout H) the sherif of the town, your daughter has been kidnapped by Gary Gun and Ask for a ransom of 1 million dollars, the only way that you can collect the money is by killing the most wanted criminals for the rewards, ¿Can you save your daughter?
